ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] mystcial path
ygData.msgSnippet: The way it should work is that it forms a path and as you follow, wherever you walk through disappears but it should keep going toward your destination.
ygData.messageBody:
The way it should work is that it forms a path and as you follow, wherever you walk through disappears but it should keep going toward your destination. Sometimes it can be hard to see though.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-03-07, 14:10:00 you wrote: =======

>when i try to find something on everquest platinum and it says a
>mystical path appears before u.. i never see it. I might see part
>of it in front of me a lil ways away.. but when i go towards it it
>dissapears. can anybody help me with this? What might be causing
>this?
>
>
